readable.title: 2880874989_a33b632924
readable.content: a child in a black shirt reaches for a white kitchen stove A little kid in a black shirt and striped pants is playing with the controls on a stove . a toddler in stripy pants is reaching for a white stove in a red floored kitchen . A toddler is reaching up to touch a stove . The toddler touches the white stove .
